name: The Great Migration
description:
The penguins are migrating! Help them get to safety by manipulating the environment. Build blocks they can walk on, and destroy unwanted blocks in their path.

The game was originally made for the 77th onehourgamejam and more levels and features were added later during the October challenge.

Feel free to play for free! The goal of the October challenge is to make some money off gamedev - so donations are enabled. I promise to make atleast one new level for each donation!

In any case, I hope to also add more features and tiles to the game - it's a work in progress.

Let me know if you've played it and have any comments/feedback!
